Title: The Architect (No. 107)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Chap Taylor, Dave Metzger
Actors: Amir Arison, Megan Boone, Patrick Cann, Serge Didenko
Plot: Aram goes undercover to find a criminal who makes crimes for a profit; Tom continues to look for details about his past; Red attempts to find the source of his compromised business operations.
